PROJECT_NAME_LENGTH: Project name must be between 1 and 255 characters
PROJECT_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH: Project description must not exceed 255 characters
PROJECT_THUMB_URL_LENGTH: Thumbnail URL must not exceed 500 characters
PROJECT_NOT_FOUND_OR_UNAUTHORIZED: Project not found or you don't have permission to update it
PROJECT_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: Project with this name already exists
PROJECT_CREATE_RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: You have exceeded the project creation limit. Please try again later.
PROJECT_UPDATE_RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: You have exceeded the project update limit. Please try again later.
NO_MEDIA_FOUND: No media found for this project
